column1: Questions
Which type of custom fields can be used as External ID? (Choose three.)
column14: A text field that is unique
column16: A text field that is encrypted
column20: A text field that is required

column1: Which of the following represent correct syntax to display first name from global variable user? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
Which statements are correct about encrypted fields among the following? (Choose four.)
column10: Encrypted fields can be included in search results, and report results.
column12: They are not available for use in filters such as list views, reports, roll-up summary fields, and rule filters.
column14: Encrypted text fields can be an external ID and can have default values.
column16: Encrypted fields are not available in lead conversion, workflow rule criteria or formulas, formula fields, outbound messages, default values, and Web-to-Lead and Web-to-Case forms.
column18: Encrypted fields are not searchable and cannot be used to define report criteria.

column1: What is not a possible action of the Lightning Process Builder?
What is the maximum number of external IDs an object may have?
You have created a workflow rule to send an e-mail in your configuration sandbox.For some reason it's not working, what should you double check? (Choose two.)
column10: Look at the system audit trail.
column12: HTML does not work in sandbox, make sure your e-mail has no HTML.
column14: You have the correct e-mail address.

column1: Which API cannot be used to create the data model? (Choose three.)
Which Validation formula is valid to make sure Phone & Email fields are filled in when converting a Lead?
What is the name for an object that enables a many-to-many relationship between two other objects?
Which of the following is true about Roll-up Summary Fields?
column10: Roll-up Summary can be used to compute SUM, MIN, MAX, AVG over a set of records.
column14: Roll-up Summary can only be set on the parent of a Master-Detail or Lookup relationship.
column16: The results of the Roll-up Summary is displayed on the child in a master-detail relationship.

column1: Which statement about record types is true? (Choose two.)
column10: The ability to create records of a specific record type is determined by the profile.
column12: Record types can be used to define picklist values available for a given field.
column14: Record types can only be assigned to one profile at a time.
column16: Users cannot view records assigned to a record type their profile does not have access to.

column1: When a user creates a record by using an object specific create action, what feed item for that record appears? (Choose three.)
column10: In the Chatter feed of the first user who follows the record on the record was created.
column12: In the Chatter feed of the user who created the record.
column14: As the first entry in the feed for the new record.
column16: In the feed for the record on which the new record was created.
column18: In the user profile feed for all users who can view the record.

column1: When would a developer use upsert and external IDs? (Choose two.)
column10: To use Web Services API to query for data.
column12: To migrate customizations from a sandbox to production.
column14: To load related records without knowing Salesforce record IDs.
column16: To integrate with an external system.

column1: What is true when a field update is set to re-evaluate the workflow rule? (Choose three.)
column10: In a batch update, workflow is only re-triggered on the entities where there is a change E.
column12: Any workflow rules whose criteria are met as a result of the field update will be ignored.
column14: Only workflow rules on the same object as the initial field update will be re-evaluated and triggered.
column16: Cascade of workflow rule re-evaluation and triggering can happen up to ten times after the initial field update that started it.
column18: Only workflow rules that didn't fire before will be re-triggered.

column1: What tools do you need to use to migrate Metadata to Two Different Production Orgs? (Choose three.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
What statements are true about managed packages? (Choose two.)
column12: Managed packages allow for property protection.
column16: Managed packages do not allow for licensing.

column1: Which functions are available when creating a Roll-up Summary Field? (Choose four.)
Which type of component CANNOT be added to a Lightning App Builder page? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
Which of the following are advantages to using Lightning Process Builder over Workflow rules? (Choose two.)
column10: There are more actions available to you.
column12: Lightning Process Solutions are bulkified while Workflow rules are not.
column16: Solutions may have more than one outcome.

column1: Your company has a Custom Object called Projects with a Lookup relationship to Opportunities. Once an Opportunity is closed won a project needs to be created automatically and assigned to a queue.How would you best accomplish this requirement?
Which of these is true about the Lookup Relationship?
column10: Security access of the child record is dependent upon the parent record.
column12: Deleting an object deletes its children.
column14: Roll-up Summary Field can be used to perform basic operations over all children of a parent record.
column16: Parent is not a required field and may be omitted.

column1: What type of data cannot be imported using the import wizard?

Which functionality is NOT available on a custom object?
Which Action Type is not available when working with Global Actions? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
What is true about a junction object?
column10: A standard object that has two Master-Detail relationships.
column12: A standard object that has one Master-Detail relationship.
column14: A custom object that has two Master-Detail relationships.
column16: A custom object that has one Master-Detail relationship.

column1: Which of the following cannot be done via a Workflow?
Which of the following is not a valid return type of a custom formula?
What type of field cannot be used in a formula field?
When Record Types control picklist values, you need to ___________. (Choose two.)
column10: If removed from picklist, value won't be available on any record types but the value on existing record will not change.
column12: You need to manually add values to Opportunity Source, Lead Source and Case source.
column14: Manually add values to the Record Types.

column1: Which statements are true regarding Roll-Up Summary Fields? (Choose three.)
column10: Automatically derived fields, such as current date or current user, are allowed in a Roll-up Summary Field.
column12: Because Roll-up Summary Fields are not displayed on edit pages, you can use them in validation rules.
column14: Once created, you cannot change the detail object selected or delete any field referenced in your Roll-up Summary definition.
column16: Validation errors can display when saving either the detail or master record.
column18: Advanced currency management has no affect on Roll-up Summary Fields.

column1: What is true about a custom tab?
column10: It can only be included in standard applications.
column12: It can be included in as many applications as desired.
column14: It can only be included in one application.
column16: It can only be included in custom applications.

column1: Global actions can be created to let users create which of the following kinds of records? (Choose three.)
Which Salesforce Formula Function can return a value based on more than two different field parameters?
What is true about Social Networks in Salesforce?
column10: You must login with your own personal social network account to work with social accounts.
column12: You must login with your company's social network account to work with social accounts.
column14: You must be careful about who you give access to social accounts, as they do not follow a security model.
column16: Social accounts allow you to manage your company's social media from within Salesforce.

column1: Which is true about social accounts?
column10: Connection to social account is established through a company wide "named principal".
column12: You can use social accounts to import data into Salesforce.
column14: You need a personal social account in order to see social account data.
column16: You can use social accounts data even when you are not logged into the social account.

column1: Which is true about encrypted fields?
column10: A custom field can be converted to an encrypted field.
column12: They are available in Validation Rules or Apex Scripts even if the user is not having the permission "View Encrypted Data".
column14: Encrypted fields can be converted to other field types.
column16: In Email Templates, if an encrypted field needs to be displayed without the mask character, the User who receives the email should have the View Encrypted Data permission.

column1: Which developer tool can be used to create a data model? (Choose two.)

column10: Object specific actions on the custom object

column1: What Lightning Experience feature allows Salesforce users to modify existing records without opening them?

column12: You have to expose the master-detail field on the child object page layout.
column14: When the parent record is deleted, all child records will be deleted.

column10: When standard Salesforce functionality needs to be extended.
column12: To find answers to Salesforce application questions.

column16: To submit ideas for Salesforce application enhancements.

column1: What type of field needs to be wrapped in a function (in a formula) to be accessed?

column10: They allow cases to be assigned to queues.
column12: They allow more than one active assignment rule.
column14: Create a complex business logic assignment rules.
column16: Predefined Case Team is mandatory for each entry rule.

column1: Identify the field update limitations. (Choose three.)
column10: The results of a field update can't trigger additional rules such as validation, assignment, auto-response, or escalation rules.
column12: Read-only fields like formula or auto-number fields aren't available for field updates.
column14: Field updates that are executed as approval actions don't trigger workflow rules.
column16: In a batch update, workflow is re-triggered on all entities where there is a change.

column1: An organization wants to create a field to store manager data on the user object. The manager field is a reference to another user record.What type of relationship should be used?
In terms of the order of execution, what must be taken into account when using Validation rules & Workflows?
column10: The order of execution can be controlled in Salesforce setup.
column12: Validation rules fire before Workflow rules therefore will not catch any data that does not abide by your Validation rules.
column14: Validation rules fire after Workflow rules, so you must ensure that Workflow rules abide by your Validation rules to avoid errors.
column16: Validation rules & Workflow rules fire on separate automation schedules and therefore the order of execution can be ignored.

column1: Currently defined picklist values are retained when you change a picklist to a multi-select picklist.
To enable the Publisher Actions area on Page Layouts, navigate to ___________.

column10: Create a custom report with A and C fields as the relationship already exists.
column12: Create a custom report type with A, B and C, and use it in the report.
column14: Create lookup relationships between A, B and C.

column1: Person Accounts ___________. (Choose two.)
column12: Can only be merged with other person accounts.
column14: Have the same icon as Business accounts.
